item.description:
Hello everyone,

I want to invite you to a seminar given by Mother Clare Watts, who is a very special Teacher. She wrote a book about her life and personal spiritual journey. It is called Giving Birth to God: a woman's path to enlightenment. She was a home birth midwife for 17 years and a mother of 4 children. Currently, she lives in Colorado and travels throughout the country giving lectures and classes about peace and having a one on one connection to your inner Self. She only comes to Boston 3 times a year so you don't want to miss it. The fee is to cover her airfare. Please join me at this special event.

From Spiritual Seeking to Spiritual Mastery
Many people are spiritual seekers and many believe that they will remain seekers their entire lives. It is possible, however, to move beyond being just a seeker and into actual finding and working toward spiritual mastery. Mother Clare Watts, author of "Giving Birth to God: A Woman's Path to Enlightenment," has traversed the path from seeking to mastery, and now co-directs a mystical school that offers help for that inner journeyto those who desire it. Come join her and discover what it takes to move beyond being a seeker only. There will be plenty of time for questions and for a hands-on experience of moving more deeply into the spiritual world.

Blessings,
Rev Gabrielle
item.name: Seminar: From Spiritual Seeking to Spiritual Mastery
